title: Thunderbird is not downloading new inbox emails
content: Thunderbird is not downloading on 2- PC's and think may be new version causing this email locking up and working
creator: twinspindleguru

title: Wrong return email address received by recipient
content:
G'day,

Please someone who is not a piece of granite, as I am, help me solve this problem.

I 'was forced' by circumstances to obtain another email address for my wife, so that I could enter her into competitions, pay her charges, respond to her mail etc.

I entered her new email address into my 'new' Thunderbird email program (my old ISP dumped my account because it could not support me with it's new machines.)

Now whenever I send mail from my own account 'ozgunman@gmail.com' it is received from 'ggungirl33@gmail.com' and a reply is sent to that address as well, - this fault is creating havoc with my life.

Thank You Russ
creator: ozgunman

title: Thunderbird flatpak 115.1 crashes when selecting print
content:
Elementary OS (info in image), Thunderbird 115.1 (info in image), Firefox 116.0.1 (info in image)

Both Firefox and Thunderbird crash when selecting print (info in image).

Current workaround: Open gmail in Chrome and print from Chrome.

All software is the latest versions available within flathub and Elementary AppCentre.
creator: canopus_hp
